name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Attack
description: This playbook provides a detailed response to an incident where an attacker used PowerShell scripts to execute additional payloads from a compromised endpoint.

action--b6f27e85-c94c-4c0e-8e28-047c2fee.description: Terminate any suspicious PowerShell processes that may be executing malicious scripts.

action--422d8d34-c03d-4c78-9fad-4b9cc3c7.description: Take the compromised endpoint offline to prevent further infiltration.
